name: Moepad
tagline: a django based weibo bot for zh.MoeGirl.org
body:
Project MoePad
====

本程序用于支持萌娘百科的更（平）新（板）姬在新浪和腾讯微博的自动更新_(:з”∠)_

环境依赖：
----
*  Python 2.7
*  Django 1.4.1
*  APScheduler 2.1.0
*  BeautifulSoup 3.2.1
*  pysqlite-2.6.3
*  memcached

License: MIT
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
